name: Modern Car Traffic Race Pro
description:
Modern car traffic racing is a free racing game which gives you a chance to drive against various racing rivals to show your real street racing skills and stunts. Let’s start your turbo engine, tap speed and drive furiously and beat the rivals with your endless driving adventure.
If you are street racing lover and love to drag your rc car on highway then grab this game today to experience most thrilling racing game ever with smooth control, real modern racing car physics, highly tuned vehicle and multiple opponents. Drive your crazy car to earn score and unlock whole brand new racing car to chop your rivals with your furious speed and experience real road racing adventure.
Feature:
Thrilling racing trip.
Loads of traffic legends.
Fast and furious racing challenge.
Tuned vehicles to drive.
Dynamic control.
